content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could assist you in planning your trip to Cancun. Booking the snorkeling trip and Tulum Ruins tour through the Hyatt Zilara Cancun's concierge and Amigo Tours, respectively, will ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience.

Remember to confirm the details of your bookings, including the dates, times, and meeting points, with the concierge and Amigo Tours. It's also a good idea to ask about any cancellation policies or refunds in case of unexpected changes.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic time in Cancun, and I wish you a wonderful celebration of your new decade!

Safe travels, and happy adventuring!
